title.narrative: Laying the foundations for sustainable peace in Burkina Faso: Proposal for a participatory analysis of drivers of conflict and resilience factors

description.narrative: This project implements a process through which the population of Burkina Faso can openly express, in their own terms, how they understand the current threats to peace and security in their country and how they are addressing these challenges in order to provide stakeholders with a thorough analysis of the drivers of conflict and resilience factors to inform evidence-based strategies and decision-making on peacebuilding engagement and programming in the country and region.
Incoming payment from Netherlands - Ministry of Foreign Affairs

title.narrative: Objective 1: To conduct a thorough analysis of the drivers of conflict and resilience factors as understood by the Burkinabe population

description.narrative: Outcome: Main drivers of conflict and resilience factors, as expressed by local populations are identified and made accessible to relevant stakeholders interested in developing peacebuilding initiatives in Burkina Faso
